ModMetaData.name: Zabrak Race (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Xen
ModMetaData.description:
Update of Xens mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2018388859
[img]https://i.imgur.com/GYswkZ7.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/ZabrakRace
- Added Royalty faction-patch
--- Original Description --- Zabrak race, using the Humanoid Alien framework, and a couple hairs borrowed and altered with permission by Spoonshortage. (Thanks!)
Adds Zabrak (Darth Maul's race from Star Wars) factions and pawns - both as player faction and random colonies Playable as a tribal-level start faction (pick them instead of "new arrivals" in scenario editor)
-------REQUIRES ALIEN FRAMEWORK BY ERDELF!
-------Make sure the FRAMEWORK is loaded BEFORE any races in mod order!!
